featured.text: Black tea preparation consists mainly of picking young leaves and leaf buds on a clear sunny day and letting the leaves dry for about an hour in the sun.

definition.zh_def: 植物的嫩芽或新生的枝條，通常在春季出現。
definition.en_def: A young shoot or sprout from a plant, typically appearing in spring.
definition.example: The tree started to grow new buds as the weather warmed up.
